s: Engineer by day, artist by night, Boombotix founder Lief Storer wanted a safer alternative to wearing headphones while commuting on his bicycle through the city. So he built one. By combining a Japanese vinyl toy, hand-built speaker internals and a walkie-talkie clip - the Boombotix brand was born. ...
